content.text:
# National Committee of the Chinese Banking Workers' Union

The National Committee of the Chinese Banking Workers’ Union is a national industrial union of the All-China Federation of Trade Unions in the People's Republic of China.
External links
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20060507080146/http://www.acftu.org.cn/about.htm basic info from the ACFTU]
